definition.value: Process authorization for a local organization specified via extension http://highmed.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension
Process authorization for a remote organization specified via extension http://highmed.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension
Process authorization for a local consortium member with role specified via extension http://highmed.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension
Process authorization for a remote consortium member with role specified via extension http://highmed.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/extension
Process authorization for all local organizations
Process authorization for all remote organizations
